narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Applicant and facility meet all requirements to obtain a Exhibitor 'C'  license.
Discussed identification.
Dogs/cats must be identified with official USDA identification within 30 days after license number is received.
Record-keeping requirements were explained to the applicant.
 Address given to applicant:
USDA APHIS AC
920 Main Campus Drive
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
No regulated activities may be conducted by the applicant until a USDA license is issued.
Inspection and exit interview conducted with Applicant.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
